TextEng: <StartAction>Automatic</Start> My adventures speak for themselves.
<StartAction>Manual</Start> I wish to make my own choices.
"Carry on, soldier."
"Fire at will."
"Concentrate your fire on the enemy's catapults."
"Concentrate your fire in front of the City Gates."
"Carry on, soldier."
"I need you to heal those in the right inner tower."
"I need you to heal those in the right outer tower."
"I need you to heal those in the left inner tower."
"I need you to heal those in the left outer tower."
"I need you to heal those in the courtyard."
"Carry on, soldier."
"I need your unit to defend the right inner tower."
"I need your unit to defend the left inner tower."
"I need your unit to defend the right outer tower."
"I need your unit to defend the left outer tower."
"Position your squad near the inner gates."
"Position your squad near the outer gates."
"I need your unit to defend the courtyard."
"Carry on, soldier."
"I need your unit to defend the north part of town against surprise attack."
"I need your unit to go defend the south east."
"I need your unit to go defend the south west."
"I need your unit to stay here and defend the seer."
<StartAction>Do nothing.</Start>
<StartAction>Leap into the hole.</Start>
